abstract: After the art fair, many in the audience have ended their nights at the St. John Hotel, where the artist, who has spent most of the week in her pajamas, holds court.
snippet: After the art fair, many in the audience have ended their nights at the St. John Hotel, where the artist, who has spent most of the week in her pajamas, holds court.

headline.main: Frieze Frame | Sarah Lucas's Bedside Manner
